--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Jackie sighs.  "You're not dying on my watch, bub!" he mutters, 
> retracting one of his hands to extend an interface module from the 
> socket.  The device connects to Blackfang's head.  "Computer 
> override, activate stasis lock." the Autobot commands, referring to 
> Blackie's SL, not his own.
>
